Class MapModel

java.lang.Object
Launcher.MapModel
public class MapModel extends Object
Model holding the visual and traffic-related state for the dashboard.

This class provides thread-safe access to the set of active VehicleSprite objects, node positions, traffic light states, and per-road signal queues and statistics. It contains helpers to enqueue sprites into signal queues, remove sprites, compact queues visually and compute queue positions in front of destination nodes.

  • Constructor Details

    • MapModel

      public MapModel()
      Create a new MapModel and initialize per-road structures.

      Traffic lights, signal queues and queue statistics are created for roads that lead to crossroads. Collections are chosen to be safe for concurrent access from simulator and UI threads.

  • Method Details

    • getQueueStats

      public Map<RoadEnum,QueueStats> getQueueStats()
      Return queue sampling statistics for each road.
      Returns:
      map of RoadEnum to QueueStats

    • enqueueToSignal

      public void enqueueToSignal(RoadEnum road, VehicleSprite s)
      Enqueue a sprite to the signal queue for the given road.

      If the sprite is already present in the queue it will not be duplicated; instead the existing index is used to compute the visual target point. The sprite is moved (animated) to the computed traffic point in front of the destination node. Queue sampling statistics are updated when a new sprite is appended.

      Parameters:
      road - the road whose signal queue to use
      s - the sprite to enqueue

    • removeSpriteFromAllQueues

      public void removeSpriteFromAllQueues(String id)
      Remove a sprite with the given id from all signal queues.
      Parameters:
      id - the sprite (vehicle) id to remove

    • compactQueue

      public void compactQueue(RoadEnum road)
      Compact the visual queue for a road by repositioning each sprite to its canonical traffic point based on the current queue order.
      Parameters:
      road - the road whose queue should be compacted

    • computeTrafficPoint

      public static Point computeTrafficPoint(Point origin, Point dest, int index)
      Compute the on-canvas point where queued vehicles should stop in front of the destination node.
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin node canvas point
      dest - the destination node canvas point
      index - the zero-based position in the queue (0 = first)
      Returns:
      the computed canvas point where the sprite should be positioned
